about_the_game:
Master Blaster VR brings the thrill of cricket to Virtual Reality in an Arcade mode, bringing fast paced action to the comforts of your space. Using a challenging gameplay mode and an intelligent AI system Master Blaster VR is a cricket gaming experience meant to be enjoyed by fans of the sport of all ages.

Features:
  • Select how many overs you want to play.
  • Get assigned a random score to beat within the time limit
  • Compete against yourself or invite your friends over to beat your high-score.
  • Analyze your shots and strategies before each ball.
  • Compete against fielders that studies your batting patterns.
  • Keep playing and perfecting your strike until you gain the highscore.

name: Master Blaster VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (x64) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Master Blater VR brings the thrill of cricket to Virtual Reality in an Arcade mode, bringing fast paced action to your living room. Using a challenging gameplay mode and an intelligent AI system Master Blaster VR is a cricket expereince meant to be enjoyed by fans of the sport of all ages.
